imageUrl.label: Image URL
imageUrl.description: URL of the image to display in the album

bitmap-patterns.title: Bitmap Patterns
bitmap-patterns.description: Demonstrating using custom classes to create bitmap patterns. See /utils/pre-satori.ts for more details. Edit this recipe at /app/recipes/screens/bitmap-patterns.tsx

wikipedia.title: Wikipedia Article
wikipedia.description: A component that displays random Wikipedia articles.

bitcoin-price.title: Crypto Price Tracker
bitcoin-price.description: A component that displays the current cryptocurrency price and market data. Supports any cryptocurrency available on CoinGecko.

cryptoSymbol.label: Cryptocurrency Symbol
cryptoSymbol.description: The CoinGecko ID of the cryptocurrency (e.g., 'bitcoin', 'ethereum', 'cardano'). Defaults to 'bitcoin'.

weather.title: Weather Forecast
weather.description: A component that displays current weather data from Open-Meteo API. Supports configurable locations via latitude/longitude or location name.

location.label: Location
location.description: City or place name to fetch weather for

responsive-example.title: Responsive Example
responsive-example.description: An example component demonstrating responsive design patterns and layout techniques for bitmap displays.

color-dashboard.title: Color Dashboard
color-dashboard.description: A composite e-ink dashboard with weather, calendar, time, and daily quote. Optimized for 7-color displays like the Inky Impression 7.3" (800x480).

location.label: Location
location.description: City or place name for weather data

color-weather.title: Color Weather
color-weather.description: Detailed weather screen with colored temperature indicators, 4-day forecast, and hourly data. Uses the 7-color e-ink palette.

location.label: Location
location.description: City or place name for weather data

daily-agenda.title: Daily Agenda
daily-agenda.description: Color-coded daily schedule with morning/afternoon/evening sections and a task checklist. Designed for 7-color e-ink displays.

daily-quote.title: Daily Quote
daily-quote.description: Minimalist daily quote screen with category-based accent colors. A new quote each day, cycling through a curated collection.

color-world-clock.title: Color World Clock
color-world-clock.description: Six world clocks with analog faces, day/night color indicators, and UTC offset badges. Designed for 7-color e-ink displays.

cities.label: Cities
cities.description: Comma-separated list of city names (e.g., 'Tokyo, London, New York'). Max 6 cities.
cities.default: San Francisco, New York, London, Berlin, Tokyo, Sydney
cities.placeholder: San Francisco, New York, London, Berlin, Tokyo, Sydney

color-habit-tracker.title: Color Habit Tracker
color-habit-tracker.description: Weekly habit tracking grid with color-coded completion status, streak counters, and progress percentage. Optimized for 7-color e-ink displays.

color-cooking.title: Color Cooking
color-cooking.description: Daily cooking recipe with dish name, ingredients, instructions, and a QR code linking to the full recipe. Fetches from TheMealDB API with optional cuisine filtering.

cuisine.label: Cuisine
cuisine.description: Filter by cuisine/area (e.g., 'Italian', 'Indian', 'Japanese'). Leave empty for a random dish.

color-google-photos.title: Color Google Photos
color-google-photos.description: Display a random photo from a Google Photos shared album URL in a color e-ink friendly layout with metadata and status.

title.label: Title
title.description: Optional title shown in the header.

color-air-quality.title: Color Air Quality
color-air-quality.description: Air quality index dashboard with colored AQI gauge, pollutant level bars, and health advice. Header color changes dynamically based on AQI level. Uses the free Open-Meteo Air Quality API.

location.label: Location
location.description: City or place name for air quality data

not-found.title: Not Found Recipe
not-found.description: A fallback recipe displayed when a requested recipe is not found.
